Ela foi terrivel, tbm nunca critiquei nenhum video mas poxa, ela

presidente" ela enrola falando, "quero saber o que o presidente da empresa 
esta pensando".

captions.text:
"Thought"!
Andy, Elidio and José will play!

In this game, the players
will start a scene,

whenever I want to hear one
of the characters' thoughts,
I will ring the bell.

I'd like to know from you,
what's your profession?

- Analyst.
- Of what? People?

- IT analyst. - 'IT analyst'.
The "Thought Game" starts now!

Mr. President.
The analyst is here, and he...

- Let him in!
- He will get into the espionage case,

I am certain, he's the
best analyst we have!

- Hello, Mr. President...
- Don't touch Mr. President!

I want to hear
Mr. President's thoughts.
I never knew what IT means.

Mr. President, we believe the attacks...
May I use the computer?

- You do IT, right?
- IT.

- IT analyst.
- Yes, I am.

We believe that the attacks
that occurred last tuesday,

were originated from
Kazakyostan!

I want to know what the
president's assistant is thinking!

Guard the door, that's what I do,
to guard the door!

I'm the right hand! I guard the door,
that's what I do, to guard the door!

I like to guard doors!
Door! That's what I do!

I like that. I like... Wait! Door?
It's mine! Nobody touches this door!

- Well...
- You have to be careful!

- Of course.
- This is very important!

The intel we have is
that at two-forty seven,

we believe that, by accessing
this website, you actually
left a breach in the system...
I want to hear the president's thoughts.
Could IT mean 'intelligent traffic'?
Could it be 'immortal turtle'?
What could it be?

Help me, please...
An entire city is...
They're invading right now, sir!
Where?
In the computer, idiot!
I'll try to create a diversion!

I'll find where they are
accessing from!

- Go!
- I'm tracing, and it comes from...
The room on our right!
Yes, the room on our right!
Room on our right!
Analyst!

Room on our right. Room on our.
Room on...

That's weird, it's
cacophonous or something!

Roomonour. Room on our right.
Roomonouright.

Room on our right. Room.
Roomonouright.
Room on our right!

How does he feel?
He's a little roomonouright!
Let's go!
Follow me!
Freeze, Mr. President!
You heard that, let's go back!
Oh, my God!

He must have turned back, because
he was in the room on our right!
President's thoughts!
'Italian tomato'?

- Hey, boy! Why...
- Get back! Who are you?

I'm an information
technology analyst!

CIA. BARBIXAS DE HUMOR
presented

IMPROVÁVEL
Probably a good show.

WATCH POLITICAL CAMPAIGN
RICARDO REIS / ÁLVARO CAMPOS

WATCH MORE IMPROVÁVEL
WITH CAROL / WITH JOSÉ / THOUGHT

WATCH MORE
SKETCHES 1ST SEASON / EM BREVES
